clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text: Unless otherwise stated below, this information is not used for any other purpose.

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: Your personal data is not shared with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text:
We do not share your information with companies, organizations, or individuals outside of LineageOS unless one of the following circumstances applies:

  • With your consent (Submission of bug reports to our bug tracking platform is considered consent.)
  • When legally required.

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable
clauses.description: The Agreement explains they will disclose personal data about you if it is reasonably necessary to comply with applicable law and government requests.
clauses.clause_text:
We will share the information we have with entities outside of LineageOS if we have a good faith belief that access, use, preservation, or disclosure of the information is necessary to:

  • meet any applicable law, regulation, legal process or enforceable governmental request.

case.text: The service will only respond to government requests that are reasonable

clauses.title: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk
clauses.description: This service does not provide any guarantees as to its usability or fitness for the users' purposes. Users agree to use it at their own risk, accepting any possible bugs, malfunctions or harm to their devices.
clauses.clause_text: All information and files — both in source and compiled form — are provided on an as is basis.

case.text: The service is provided 'as is' and to be used at your sole risk

clauses.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
clauses.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.
clauses.clause_text: Certain information (e.g. a device unique anonymized ID, device model, etc.) is transmitted to us solely for the purpose of measuring non-personally identifiable installation metrics.

case.text: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
clauses.clause_text: This information includes Internet Protocol (IP) addresses

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
